433A  (I) In  the  case  of a  vehicle  let  under  a  hire  purchase  or  leasing  agreement,
the  person  registered as  the absolute owner of such vehicle under the  Motor Traffic
Act  (Chapter 203)  shall  be  deemed to  be  the  person entitled  to  possession of such

vehicle  for  the purpose of this Chapter.

entitled to  possession of such  vehicle for the purpose of this Chapter".
